item.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
item.description: After the awesome first two films, the relative failures of The Last Stand and the Wolverine(s), and the return to form of First Class, I was cautiously hopeful for Days of Future Past. It had potential–near full casts of both sets of X-Men?–but potential doesn’t necessarily mean good.

item.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
item.description: It’s hard to count the number of things that went sideways in Jack the Giant Slayer.
